sentence: PHILADELPHIA — John Fetterman crossed his arms and cast his flushed face downward as the woman in a fedora started into her fourth verse of the song she wrote for him.

sentence: The Democratic frontrunner is John Fetterman, the lieutenant governor of Pennsylvania who sports a goatee, supports both state and federal legalization of marijuana and takes to the campaign trail in his gym shorts and black pickup truck.
